name: Arena online: pvp battles
description:
You can get a specific fantasy hero. If you prefer different magic spells, choose the wizard or elementalist and explore ways of using magic in pvp battles.

If you like melee combat, get the close range fighter like warrior, barbarian or rogue.

Choose the different epic arena modes: 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2 etc. Fight PVP online with real opponents all over the world. Or train yourself with bots for improving your skills.

There is no way you can buy victory or benefits in a battle against other players. Only skill and experience will help to get to the top. Practice a lot in order to become the best.
